channel.title: How to play runescape (for all those newcomers)
channel.description:
For all those new runescape beginners who would like to play runescape, all you need to do is visit the [url=http://runescape.com]Runescape[/url] Homepage and then you will find all these stuff,You will see two tabs near enough in the middle, maybe this will help....>>
[img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/2505/clickhere5zg.gif[/img]
Now there will be a guide that jagex made, but i'll talk you through it if your not sure,First click on create a new account tab and it should say Please indicate your age, now i started runescape where this wasn't here but jagex wants you to be 13 or over to play this game, well lame old fagex didn't block this, just choose any age lawl, ok now time to choose a nickname, you may choose any name but it can't be rude and it can't be called mod something!
Now you have chose your name, it should come up terms and conditions. if you would really like to get into runescape and like more information you are more than welcome to read the terms and conditions, otherwise scroll down and click i agree Now choose a password, this can be anything you want but remember, NEVER give anyone your password, not even to Jagex staff. Jagex staff will never ask you for your password. Passwords must be between 5 and 20 characters long. We recommend you use a mixture of numbers and letters in your password to make it harder for someone to guess.
Now you have chosen your name, password and you know your rules click "Play Runescape (Existing User) and then pick low detail- (less lag no tunes) or high detail-(more lag yes tunes) pick any world that has a [b]SILVER[/b] star next to it, this means it is non members!
If you would like to subscribe as a member please go to the main screen and there will be a list of stuff on your left hand side and find subscribe.
[center][b]How not to be a noob[/b][/center] In runescape there are a lot of people called "noobs" these are called noobs because they are low levels which ask people for cash and stuff, never be a noob, this will degrade your reputation on runescape which makes you more and more hated by begging, you can also get reported and as a result you can be banned for asking fellow members for cash, always earn your own stuff because when you are higher and rich you will see all these noobs begging you for stuff and you will feel that youv'e earnt your stuff!
[center][b]~Skills~[/b]
[b][i]F2P Skills[i][b]
1 Attack 2 Stregnth 3 Defence 4 Hitpoints 5 Magic 6 Ranging 7 Cooking & Fishing 8 Runecrafting 9 Smithing & Mining 10 Prayer 11 Woodcutting 12 Firemaking
[b][i]Members Skills[/i][/b]
13 Agility 14 Farming 15 Heblore 16 Theiving 17 Fleching 18 Slayer 19 Construction[/center]
Thank you for your time and welcome to the freaky world of runescape.
~Str by zammy~
